    • Method Detail

      • createConfigFolder

        public void createConfigFolder()
        Builds the Folder on the sdcard that holds all of the configuration files if it doesn't exist. If this fails, a complainToast will pop up.

      • getXMLFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getXMLFiles()
        Gets the list of files from the Configuration File directory, and populates the global list used by the fileSpinner

      • writeXML

        public boolean writeXML(java.util.Map<SerialNumber,ControllerConfiguration> deviceControllers)
        Actually calls the writer to write the current list of devices out to an XML file. The Write XML Handler checks for duplicate names, and will throw an error if any are found. In that case, a helpful complainToast pops up with the duplicate names, and the file is not saved or written.
        Returns:
        true if there were duplicate names, false if there were not.

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws RobotCoreException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        RobotCoreException
        java.io.IOException

      • getOutput

        public java.lang.String getOutput()

      • complainToast

        public void complainToast(java.lang.String msg,
                          android.content.Context context)
        Displays a red message with white text in the center of the screen.
        Parameters:
        msg - - the message to be displayed context - the context to display it.

      • createLists

        public void createLists(java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<SerialNumber,DeviceManager.DeviceType>> entries,
                        java.util.Map<SerialNumber,ControllerConfiguration> deviceControllers)
        Builds the list of MotorControllers, ServoControllers, and LegacyModuleControllers filled with empty motors, servos, and modules for display. The "entries" HashMap is populated by the scan button that scan for connected USB devices.

      • createMotorList

        public java.util.ArrayList<DeviceConfiguration> createMotorList()
        Creates a list of MotorConfiguration objects.
        Returns:
        motors a list of MotorConfiguration objects.

      • createServoList

        public java.util.ArrayList<DeviceConfiguration> createServoList()
        Creates a list of ServoConfiguration objects.
        Returns:
        servos a list of ServoConfiguration objects.

      • createLegacyModuleList

        public java.util.ArrayList<DeviceConfiguration> createLegacyModuleList()
        Creates a list of empty DeviceConfiguration objects.
        Returns:
        modules a list of DeviceConfiguration objects.
